Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-01: Do your workforce members receive regular training related to the HIPAA Privacy and Security Rules and the HITECH Act?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-02: Do you monitor or receive information regarding changes in HIPAA regulations?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-03: Has your organization designated HIPAA Privacy and Security officers as required by the Rules?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-04: Do you comply with the requirements of the Health Information Technology for Economic and Clinical Health Act (HITECH)?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-05: Do you have an incident response process and reporting in place to investigate any potential incidents and report actual incidents?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-06: Do you have a plan to comply with the Breach Notification requirements if there is a breach of data?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-07: Have you conducted a risk analysis as required under the Security Rule?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-08: Have you identified areas of risks?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-09: Have you taken actions to mitigate the identified risks?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-10: Does your application require user and system administrator password changes at a frequency no greater than 90 days?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-11: Does your application require a user to set their own password after an administrator reset or on first use of the account?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-12: Does your application lock-out an account after a number of failed login attempts?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-13: Does your application automatically lock or log-out an account after a period of inactivity?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-14: Are passwords visible in plain text, whether when stored or entered, including service level accounts (i.e. database accounts, etc.)?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-15: If the application is institution-hosted, can all service level and administrative account passwords be changed by the institution?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-16: Does your application provide the ability to define user access levels?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-17: Does your application support varying levels of access to administrative tasks defined individually per user?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-18: Does your application support varying levels of access to records based on user ID?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-19: Is there a limit to the number of groups a user can be assigned?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-20: Do accounts used for vendor supplied remote support abide by the same authentication policies and access logging as the rest of the system?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-21: Does the application log record access including specific user, date/time of access, and originating IP or device?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-22: Does the application log administrative activity, such user account access changes and password changes, including specific user, date/time of changes, and originating IP or device?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-23: How long does the application keep access/change logs?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-24: Can the application logs be archived?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-25: Can the application logs be saved externally?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-26: Does your data backup and retention policies and practices meet HIPAA requirements?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-27: Do you have a disaster recovery plan and emergency mode operation plan?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-28: Have the policies/plans mentioned above been tested?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-29: Can you provide a HIPAA compliance attestation document?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-30: Are you willing to enter into a Business Associate Agreement (BAA)?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - HIPAA (v2.11)
Question: HIPA-31: Have you entered into a BAA with all subcontractors who may have access to protected health information (PHI)?
